document_data.name: Leaving-House
document_data.mainbody: The '''Leaving-House''' was a [[caravanserai]] located in [[Almorel]] on the [[Lake of Mists]] in the [[Hordelands]] in the {{YearlinkName|1357}}.{{Cite interactive atlas}}
document_data.Location: The caravanserai was located along the [[Golden Way]] outside of Almorel beyond the [[East Gate (Almorel)|East Gate]].
document_data.Activities: The Leaving-House also served as a warehouse for goods.
